c = \sqrt{a^2 + b^2}

J_\alpha(x) = \sum\limits_{m=0}^\infty\frac{(-1)^m}{m! \, \Gamma(m + \alpha + 1)}{\bigl({\frac{x}{2}}\bigr)}^{2 m + \alpha}
